text: The 1951 Yugoslav First Basketball League season is the 7th season of the Yugoslav First Basketball League, the highest professional basketball league in SFR Yugoslavia. == Regular season == === League table === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" ! width=20| !! width=200|Teams !! !! width=20| !! width=20| !! width=20| !! width=20| !! width=35| !! width=35| !! Champion or relegation |- bgcolor=gold | 1. ||style="text- align:left;"| Crvena Zvezda ||38||22||18||2||2||1149||761||Champion |- align=center | 2. ||style="text-align:left;"| Partizan ||38||22||18||2||2||1119||814 |- align=center | 3. ||style="text-align:left;"| Mladost ||28||22||14||0||8||863||799 |- align=center | 4. ||style="text- align:left;"| Zadar ||25||22||12||1||9||703||693 |- align=center | 5. ||style="text-align:left;"| Železničar Ljubljana ||21 (-1)||22||9||4||9||888||867 |- align=center | 6. ||style="text-align:left;"| Enotnost ||21||22||10||1||11||962||981 |- align=center | 7. ||style="text- align:left;"| Proleter Zrenjanin ||18||22||9||0||13||748||871 |- align=center | 8. ||style="text-align:left;"| Železničar Belgrade ||18||22||9||0||13||821||1002 |- align=center | 9. ||style="text-align:left;"| Jedinstvo ||17||22||8||1||13||953||1058 |- align=center | 10. ||style="text- align:left;"| BSK ||16||22||7||2||13||776||827 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 11. ||style="text-align:left;"| Lokomotiva ||12||22||6||0||16||769||902 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 12. ||style="text-align:left;"| Egység Novi Sad ||11||22||5||1||16||859||1035 |} == Winning Roster == The winning roster of Crvena zvezda: * Milorad Sokolović * Ðorđe Andrijašević * Borislav Ćurčić * Srđan Kalember * Milan Bjegojević * Aleksandar Gec * Borko Jovanović * Nebojša Popović * Dragan Godžić * Ladislav Demšar * Strahinja Alagić * Dimitrije Krstić * Tullio Rochlitzer Coach: Nebojša Popović == External links == * Yugoslav First Basketball League Archive 1951
